name: Fig Purple Wool Blend Felt Rose Flower on 1/4 in Ivory Elastic Headband
description:
This listing is for a beautiful Fig Purple Rose Wool Felt Blend Rose Flower Headband. This flower measures 1 3/4" inches and sits on top two green leaves and a 1/4 in ivory elastic headband. Perfect for any outfit and is a great headband for any photo shoot!

Upon checkout please indicate the size headband you would like to purchase using the following chart:

1. Newborn to 3 months--13 1/4 inches
2. 3 to 6 months--14 1/2 inches
3. 6 to 12 months--16 inches
4. 12 months and up-- 17 1/2 inches
5. Adult 18 inches

Please contact me if you are interested in a different color and I would be happy to help.  Also if you would prefer no leaves please send us a message we can make it without!

*An important reminder...some of our items contain small parts or are small parts in and of themselves and can potentially pose a choking hazard. Please never leave a small child unattended while wearing any hair accessories.
Thanks for looking

name: Trio of Girlie Wool Blend Felt Rose Flower Bobby Pins-for toddlers through adults
description:
Three Girlie Wool Blend Felt Flowers on top of Silver Bobby Pins in White, Pink & Purple. Each flower measures approximately 1 in. These bobby pins are a perfect accessory for any toddler to adult. 

Have tons of other color combinations if you are interested please contact me.

Please become a fan on my Facebook page to find out more about specials I am having
https://www.facebook.com/pages/Laney-Bug-Creations/131399056934826

name: Trio of Minnie Mouse Hair Clips on 1 3/8 in alligator clip for Girls through Adults
description:
This set of three adorable partially lined minnie mouse alligator clips are great for any girl who loves minnie mouse! They are perfect for girls of all ages and can sweep the shortest of bangs out of your child's face!

It's such a cute look. All clips measure approximately 1 3/8 inches and are heat sealed to prevent fraying. All items are hand sewn to the clip!

A non-slip grip can be added to any of our alligator clips for no additional charge just let us know when checking out!

My daughter's favorite clippies

*An important reminder...some of our items contain small parts or are small parts in and of themselves and can potentially pose a choking hazard. Please never leave a small child unattended while wearing any hair accessories.
Thanks for looking

name: Brown, Rust, Yellow & Orange Wool Blend Felt Rose Flower Trio on 1/4 in Dark Brown Pink Elastic Head
description:
This listing is for a beautiful Headband made of FOUR Large Wool Felt Blend Roses--Brown, Mustard (yellow), Mac & Cheese (bright orange) & Nutmeg (Rust) Rose Wool Felt Blend which sits on top of 1/4 in dark brown elastic Headband. Each flower measures approximately 1 3/4" inches and sits on top of 2 green leaves. Perfect for any photo shoot or to go with all those new school outfits

Upon checkout please indicate the size headband you would like to purchase using the following chart:

1. Newborn to 3 months--13 1/4 inches
2. 3 to 6 months--14 1/2 inches
3. 6 to 12 months--16 inches
4. 12 months and up-- 17 1/2 inches
5. Adult 18 inches

I have tons of other colors please contact me if you would like a different color combination.

*An important reminder...some of our items contain small parts or are small parts in and of themselves and can potentially pose a choking hazard. Please never leave a small child unattended while wearing any hair accessories.
Thanks for looking

name: TEN (10) adorable Girly Daisy Flower 30mm snap clips
description:
This listing is for 10 Girly Daisy Flower Snap Clips in the perfect colors for every little girls wardrobe! They are great for girls of all sizes but especially infant girls with not too much hair. No need to tape bows to their little heads anymore :)

Each clip measures approximately 1 1/2 inches long (30mm). These clips are perfect for sweeping bangs back or adding a little something to a newborns outfit. 

*An important reminder...some of our items contain small parts or are small parts in and of themselves and can potentially pose a choking hazard. Please never leave a small child unattended while wearing any hair accessories.
Thanks for looking
